notes: The Spider Queen is immune to physical damage such as melee which is often used in Rookgaard. Nor will your [[skills]] advance if you attempt to train on it.
abilities: {{Ability List| {{Ability|[[Melee]]|no damage, but turns you into a [[Cocooned Victim]]|element=shapeshifting}} }}
name: Spider Queen
behaviour: Runs at you and will start to wrap you in silk and will take you too her [[Large Spider Web|web]].
location: Can only be found in the {{Mapper Coords|125.51|125.112|7|4|text=Spider Lair}} in [[Rookgaard]].
strategy: The best way to avoid the Spider Queen is using a [[Greasy Stone]] so that it cannot smell you.
